name: 2014.Aftermath
description: Nevertheless, the world has perished. 35 years after the Nuclear Apocalypse, spent in the underground shelter, one of its inhabitants makes up his mind to find way out to the surface.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU 1 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible DirectX: Version 8.1a Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
